title: Delivery platform
key_stats_section.stat2_text: Days to set up your virtual restaurant

title: The advantages of choosing
advantages_section.text: Light Kitch allows restaurants to easily and quickly create virtual storefronts.

skill1.title: Expertise in optimizing results
skill1.text: With our experience in delivery apps, we handle all the levers to optimize your results.

skill2.title: Virtual storefronts for restaurants
skill2.text: Light Kitch allows restaurants to easily and quickly create virtual storefronts.

skill3.title: Custom virtual restaurants
skill3.text: We offer virtual restaurants designed based on the consumption habits of your area.

skill4.title: Delivery, the future of the food industry
skill4.text: Delivery has changed consumption habits and is the future of the food industry.

skill5.title: New sales channels
skill5.text: This concept allows your restaurant, whether already present or not on these platforms, to deliver products via new sales channels.

skill6.title: Increase your revenue and customer base
skill6.text: These virtual storefronts will give you the opportunity to generate more revenue and acquire additional customers.

brahim_feedback.title: What Brahim thinks of us

text.quote: Light Kitch is a great discovery, which has brought us a new customer base. Thanks to their advice and expertise, the team supported us through a difficult time for the food industry. Light Kitch highlighted the potential of my delivery service, thank you.

brahim_feedback.author: Brahim, a restaurateur with multiple accounts optimized by Light Kitch on various delivery apps.

text.quote: Thanks to Light Kitch, we were able to multiply our sales. We reached a new customer base, which helped us gain recognition. We were already known in Lille, but now even more! The tablets are constantly ringing, and it's great.
Whenever we call them, they're there. The service is perfect. I'll gladly continue working with Light Kitch!
